name: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
author: AZI
content: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer&#039s academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon&#039s insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?
